h:ul.h:li: Control of calculation type angle, bond, defect, distance, eem, efg, fit, free_energy, genetic, gradients, md, noenergy, optimize, pot, predict, property, phonon, single, torsion, transition_state
Geometric variable specification breathe, bulk_noopt, cellonly, conp, conv, isotropic, nobreathe, noflags, shell

Energy calculation algorithm c6, fix_molecule, minimum_image, molecule, molmec, molq, noanisotropic, nod2sym, nodsymmetry, noelectrostatics, noexclude, nofcentral, noksymmetry, nolist_md, noreal, norecip, norepulsive, nosderv, nozeropt
Optimization method conjugate, numdiag, positive, rfo, unit

Output control average, broaden_dos, cartesian, compare, eigenvectors, hessian, intensity, linmin, nodensity, nodpsym, nofirst_point, nofrequency, nokpoints, operators, outcon, regi_before, restore, save
Structure control full, hexagonal, lower_symmetry, nosymmetry

entry.definition: keywords which control the progress of the calculation
entry.description: The document will contain a parameter constructed as in the template above. The scalar must contain a value from the keyword.value entry.

C General optimisation routine by either:
(1) Newton-Raphson (2) RFO method (3) Conjugate gradients
